name: Date

methods.name: addDays
methods.description: Adds the specified number of additional days to a Date.

methods.name: addMonths
methods.description: Adds the specified number of additional months to a Date

methods.name: addYears
methods.description: Adds the specified number of additional years to a Date

methods.name: day
methods.description: Returns the day-of-month component of a Date.

methods.name: dayOfYear
methods.description: Returns the day-of-year component of a Date.

methods.name: daysBetween
methods.description: Returns the number of days between the Date that called the method and the specified date.

methods.name: daysInMonth
methods.signature: public static Integer daysInMonth(Integer year, Integer month)
methods.description: Returns the number of days in the month for the specified year and month (1=Jan).

methods.name: format
methods.description: Returns the Date as a string using the locale of the context user

methods.name: isLeapYear
methods.description: Returns true if the specified year is a leap year.

methods.name: isSameDay
methods.description: Returns true if the Date that called the method is the same as the specified date.

methods.name: month
methods.description: Returns the month component of a Date (1=Jan).

methods.name: monthsBetween
methods.description: Returns the number of months between the Date that called the method and the specified date, ignoring the difference in days.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.signature: public static Date newInstance(Integer year, Integer month, Integer day)
methods.description: Constructs a Date from Integer representations of the year, month (1=Jan), and day.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Constructs a Date from a String. The format of the String depends on the local date format.

methods.name: today
methods.description: Returns the current date in the current user's time zone.

methods.name: toStartOfMonth
methods.description: Returns the first of the month for the Date that called the method.

methods.name: toStartOfWeek
methods.description: Returns the start of the week for the Date that called the method, depending on the context user's locale.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a Date that contains the value of the specified String.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Converts the specified object to a Date. Use this method to convert a history tracking field value or an object that represents a Date value.

methods.name: year
methods.description: Returns the year component of a Date

description: Contains methods for the Date primitive data type.
